trans-unit.source: Represents a Workflow role that is backed by a <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma função de fluxo de trabalho que é apoiada por um <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about roles in ASP.NET, see [Role Providers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre funções no ASP.NET, consulte [provedores de função](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que define o nome da função.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> class by using the specified role name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> usando o nome do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que define o nome da função.

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the role provider.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que define o provedor de função.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> class by using the specified role name and role provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> usando o nome da função e o provedor da função especificados.

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Mais usados provedores de função para <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> são classes que herdam de <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Essas classes incluem <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of ASP.NET accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista genérica de contas do ASP.NET associadas à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of string values that represent the ASP.NET accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista genérica de valores de cadeia de caracteres que representam as contas do ASP.NET associadas à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> supports only <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> oferece suporte somente a <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, it supports these methods only for the user account that is currently the WindowsPrincipal associated with the request context, so you cannot call <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> for any user account in the domain.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, ele oferece suporte a esses métodos somente para a conta de usuário que é atualmente o WindowsPrincipal associado ao contexto de solicitação, portanto não é possível chamar <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> para qualquer conta de usuário no domínio.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.GetIdentities%2A> method with the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, the following provider exception is thrown:
trans-unit.target: Ao usar o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.GetIdentities%2A> método com o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, a seguinte exceção de provedor é gerada:

trans-unit.source: The configured Role Provider (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) relies upon Windows authentication to determine the groups that the user is allowed to be a member of.
trans-unit.target: O provedor de funções configurado (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) depende da autenticação do Windows para determinar os grupos que o usuário tem permissão para ser um membro de.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Role Manager cannot be used to manage Windows users and groups.
trans-unit.target: Gerenciador de funções do ASP.NET não pode ser usado para gerenciar grupos e usuários do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Use the SQLRoleProvider if you want to support custom user/role assignment.
trans-unit.target: Use SQLRoleProvider se quiser oferecer suporte à atribuição de usuário/função personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The name of the identity to test for.
trans-unit.target: O nome da identidade cuja existência será testada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contains the specified identity
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contém a identidade especificada

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contains the specified identity; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contiver a identidade especificada, caso contrário <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.Name" /> was set to a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.Name" /> foi definido como uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the role provider for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o provedor de função para a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the role provider for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o provedor de função para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Mais usados provedores de função para <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> são classes que herdam de <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Essas classes incluem <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
